name: aws-s3-lambda-example
description: A sample application showcasing AWS S3, Lamda and Gateway API

scripts.test: npm run test:lambda && npm run test:html
scripts.deploy:s3: npm run build:s3 && cd dist/s3 && aws s3 cp . s3://${AWS_BUCKET}/ --recursive
scripts.deploy:lambda:echo: npm run build:lambda:echo && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name echo --zip-file fileb://dist/lambda/echo.zip
scripts.deploy:lambda:reverse: npm run build:lambda:reverse && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name reverse --zip-file fileb://dist/lambda/reverse.zip
scripts.deploy:lambda:uppercase: npm run build:lambda:uppercase && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name uppercase --zip-file fileb://dist/lambda/uppercase.zip
scripts.deploy:lambda: npm run deploy:lambda:echo && npm run deploy:lambda:reverse && npm run deploy:lambda:uppercase
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm test && npm run deploy:s3 && npm run deploy:lambda && npm run test:api && npm run test:integration

author: John R. Ghidiu
